mapper.insert: insert into tbl_audition(id, audition_field, audition_career, expected_amount, service_start_date, audition_deadline, audition_personnel, audition_location, audition_background, audition_category, file_content, audition_status) values(#{id}, #{auditionField}, #{auditionCareer}, #{expectedAmount}, #{serviceStartDate}, #{auditionDeadLine}, #{auditionPersonnel}, #{auditionLocation}, #{auditionBackground}, #{auditionCategory}, #{fileContent}, #{auditionStatus})
